== Description ==

This creates a link to the previous comments page containing older comments.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php previous_comments_link( 'Label' ); ?> %%%

== Examples  ==

===Default Usage===

 <?php previous_comments_link(); ?>

===Working example===

 <?php previous_comments_link( '&laquo; Older Comments' ); ?>

== Parameters ==
; label : (''string'') The link text. Default is '&laquo; Older Comments'.
